#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll read_int() {
char c = gc();
while(c<'0' || c>'9') c = gc();
ll ret = 0;
while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
ret = 10 * ret + c - 48;
c = gc();
}
return ret;
}
int main()
{
    ll t;
    double r,d,x;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>r;
        d=r+r;
        x=d*d/2;
        printf("%.6lf\n",sqrt(x));
    }
    return 0;
}
